trans-unit.resname: PTK·35 | Borrowing 100,000 Arrows | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 你的对手每有一个已横置的生物在场，你就抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·35 | Borrowing 100,000 Arrows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Kongming and Lu Su tricked Wei troops into shooting over 100,000 arrows at them to later use against the Wei at Red Cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 孔明及鲁肃用计，使得魏国的军队对他们射了超过十万只箭；稍后在赤壁战争中，这些箭便用来对付魏国。 （第四十六回 用奇谋孔明借箭）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·36 | Brilliant Plan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brilliant Plan
trans-unit.target: 绝妙好计

trans-unit.resname: PTK·36 | Brilliant Plan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·36 | Brilliant Plan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At Red Cliffs, Kongming and Zhou Yu each wrote his plan for defeating the Wei on the palm of his hand. They laughed as they both revealed the same word, "Fire."
trans-unit.target: 在赤壁，孔明及周瑜同时在手心写下他们击败魏国的计划。在打开手心，展示出相同的字～「火」后，他们相视大笑。 （第四十六回 用奇谋孔明借箭）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·37 | Broken Dam | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Broken Dam
trans-unit.target: 溃堤

trans-unit.resname: PTK·37 | Broken Dam | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap any one or two creatures without horsemanship. (Tapped creatures can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 横置任何一个或二个没有马术异能的生物。（已横置的生物不可进行阻挡）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·37 | Broken Dam | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Using nature to their advantage, wise Three Kingdoms generals often let dammed rivers loose to destroy their enemies.
trans-unit.target: 以地利为己用；在三国时代，将领们时常破坏河堤来毁灭他们的敌人。 （第三十二回 决漳河许攸献计）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·38 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Capture of Jingzhou
trans-unit.target: 收复荆州

trans-unit.resname: PTK·38 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You take another turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 你在此回合结束以后，继续进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·38 | Capture of Jingzhou | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.
trans-unit.target: 荆州在三国时期中是兵家必争之地，屡屡被魏国、蜀国及吴国垂涎。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·39 | Champion's Victory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Champion's Victory
trans-unit.target: 冠军的胜利

trans-unit.resname: PTK·39 | Champion's Victory | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.\nReturn any one attacking creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣布阻挡者之前使用。 将任一个进行攻击的生物移回其拥有者手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·40 | Council of Advisors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Council of Advisors
trans-unit.target: 参谋会议

trans-unit.resname: PTK·40 | Council of Advisors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·40 | Council of Advisors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sun Quan's long and successful rule in the years 199 to 251 was due to his ability to choose and foster talented advisors and generals.
trans-unit.target: 孙权在西元199至251年间，让江南常保富饶的原因，要归功于他的善识良将及广召谋士。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·41 | Counterintelligence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Counterintelligence
trans-unit.target: 反间行动

trans-unit.resname: PTK·41 | Counterintelligence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one or two creatures to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 移回任一个或二个生物到其拥有者手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·41 | Counterintelligence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Before the battle of Red Cliffs, a supposedly sleeping Zhou Yu allowed his old friend, a Wei advisor, to steal a planted letter forged as if from Wei's two best admirals.
trans-unit.target: 在赤壁战争之前，周瑜在好友蒋干面前诈睡，让蒋干偷走一封假信，伪称是魏国最佳的二位水军都督蔡瑁及张允所写的。 （第四十五回 群英会蒋干中计）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·42 | Exhaustion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exhaustion
trans-unit.target: 精疲力竭

trans-unit.resname: PTK·42 | Exhaustion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping creatures and lands.
trans-unit.target: 在你对手下一回合开始时，他必须略过重置生物和地。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·42 | Exhaustion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Starving and worn, Cao Cao escaped from the battle of Red Cliffs with only 27 of his original 800,000 men.
trans-unit.target: 曹操又饿又累地从赤壁战争中逃脱，八十万大军只剩下二十七名亲信。 （第五十回 诸葛亮智算华容）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·43 | Extinguish | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Extinguish
trans-unit.target: 熄灭

trans-unit.resname: PTK·43 | Extinguish | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only in response to another player playing a sorcery.\nThat sorcery has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你只能在其他的玩家使用法术时，以反应它的方式使用CARDNAME。该法术牌将不会产生任何效应，并且被放入该玩家的坟墓场中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·44 | Forced Retreat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forced Retreat
trans-unit.target: 击退

trans-unit.resname: PTK·44 | Forced Retreat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将场上任一个生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶上。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·44 | Forced Retreat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Leadership, not numbers, determines victory."\n—A Wu commander, before his 5,000 troops forced 15,000 Wei troops to retreat from Ruxu
trans-unit.target: 「胜利是取决于领导能力，而非兵力！」 ～鲁肃以五千兵力逼退敌人一万五千大军撤退到濡须前所说的话。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·45 | Lady Sun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lady Sun
trans-unit.target: 孙夫人

trans-unit.resname: PTK·45 | Lady Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap CARDNAME to return it and any one other creature to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置CARDNAME，以移回任何一个生物及CARDNAME到其拥有者手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·45 | Lady Sun | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sister to Sun Quan and wife to Liu Bei, Lady Sun often felt her loyalty to both tested.
trans-unit.target: 同时身为孙权之妹和刘备的妻子，孙夫人经常被双方探试她的忠诚心。 （第五十五回 玄德智激孙夫人）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·46 | Lu Meng, Wu General | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lu Meng, Wu General
trans-unit.target: 吴国将军吕蒙

trans-unit.resname: PTK·46 | Lu Meng, Wu General | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship
trans-unit.target: 马术

trans-unit.resname: PTK·46 | Lu Meng, Wu General | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the Wu chief commander, Lu Meng conquered Shu-held Jingzhou in 219 by disguising soldiers as merchants on boats filled with hiding troops.
trans-unit.target: 当时身为吴国都督，吕蒙在西元219年将士兵伪装成商人，并在船上藏匿军队以征服荆州。 （第七十五回 吕子明白衣渡江）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·47 | Lu Su, Wu Advisor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lu Su, Wu Advisor
trans-unit.target: 吴国参谋鲁肃

trans-unit.resname: PTK·47 | Lu Su, Wu Advisor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Lu Su to draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置鲁肃，以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·47 | Lu Su, Wu Advisor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lu Su served as an intermediary between the Wu and Shu kingdoms until Zhou Yu's death in 210, when he became Wu's supreme commander.
trans-unit.target: 鲁肃一直担任吴国与蜀国之间的调解者，直到西元210年周瑜逝世，他才成为吴国的大都督。 （第五十七回 柴桑口卧龙吊丧）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·48 | Lu Xun, Scholar General | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lu Xun, Scholar General
trans-unit.target: 儒将陆逊

trans-unit.resname: PTK·48 | Lu Xun, Scholar General | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nWhen Lu Xun successfully damages your opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 马术 当陆逊成功地对你的对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·49 | Mystic Denial | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Denial
trans-unit.target: 神秘的否定

trans-unit.resname: PTK·49 | Mystic Denial | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only in response to another player playing a creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你只能在其他的玩家使用召唤生物或是法术时，以反应它的方式使用CARDNAME。被反应的牌将不会产生任何效应，并且被放入该玩家的坟墓场中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·50 | Preemptive Strike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preemptive Strike
trans-unit.target: 先下手为强

trans-unit.resname: PTK·50 | Preemptive Strike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only in response to another player playing a creature card.\nThat creature has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你只能在其他的玩家使用召唤生物时，以反应它的方式使用CARDNAME。该生物牌将不会产生任何效应，并且被放入该玩家的坟墓场中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·51 | Red Cliffs Armada | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Red Cliffs Armada
trans-unit.target: 赤壁舰队

trans-unit.resname: PTK·51 | Red Cliffs Armada | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.
trans-unit.target: 除非防御玩家有任何海岛在场，否则CARDNAME不能攻击。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·51 | Red Cliffs Armada | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: By the battle of Red Cliffs in the year 208, the Wu kingdom controlled more than 7,000 warships on the Yangtze.
trans-unit.target: 在西元208年的赤壁战争，吴国在长江拥有超过七千艘的战船。 （第三十八回 战长江孙氏报雠）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·52 | Sage's Knowledge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sage's Knowledge
trans-unit.target: 圣人的智慧

trans-unit.resname: PTK·52 | Sage's Knowledge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将任何一张法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·52 | Sage's Knowledge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Those who know do not talk. Those who talk do not know."\n—Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*\n(trans. Feng and English)
trans-unit.target: 「知者不言，言者不知。」 ～老子，道德经

trans-unit.resname: PTK·53 | Strategic Planning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strategic Planning
trans-unit.target: 战略计划

trans-unit.resname: PTK·53 | Strategic Planning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶上的三张牌，将其中一张置入你的手中，另二张置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·53 | Strategic Planning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Plans evolved within the tent decide a victory 1,000 *li* away."
trans-unit.target: 「运筹于帷幄之中，决战于千里之外。」 （第三十九回 博望坡军师初用兵）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·54 | Straw Soldiers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Straw Soldiers
trans-unit.target: 稻草兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·54 | Straw Soldiers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The overnight appearance of miles of "armed" Wu forts at Guangling frightened a much vaster Wei force into fleeing for their lives.
trans-unit.target: 是夜江陵突然出现吴国的武装军营，吓得魏国的大军纷纷逃离。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·55 | Sun Ce, Young Conquerer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Ce, Young Conquerer
trans-unit.target: 小霸王孙策

trans-unit.resname: PTK·55 | Sun Ce, Young Conquerer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nWhen Sun Ce comes into play, you may return any one creature from play to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 马术 当孙策进场时，你可以从场上移回任一个生物到其拥有者手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·56 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
trans-unit.target: 吴国君主孙权

trans-unit.resname: PTK·56 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All your creatures gain horsemanship as long as Sun Quan is in play. (This includes Sun Quan.)
trans-unit.target: 当孙权在场上时，所有你的生物都获得马术异能。（该异能包括孙权）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·56 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."
trans-unit.target: 「二十四年兴大业，龙蟠虎踞在江东。」 （第一零八回 丁奉雪中奋短兵）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·57 | Wu Admiral | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Admiral
trans-unit.target: 吴国水军都督

trans-unit.resname: PTK·57 | Wu Admiral | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as your opponent has an island in play, CARDNAME gets +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的对手有任何海岛在场，CARDNAME便得+1S/+1D。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·57 | Wu Admiral | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Wu kingdom's well-trained admirals were integral to the Southlands' victory at Red Cliffs as well as the kingdom's defense.
trans-unit.target: 吴国训练精良的水军都督们，在赤壁之战的胜利及保国卫民上，都扮演不可或缺的角色。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·58 | Wu Elite Cavalry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Elite Cavalry
trans-unit.target: 吴国精锐骑兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·58 | Wu Elite Cavalry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship
trans-unit.target: 马术

trans-unit.resname: PTK·58 | Wu Elite Cavalry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the second battle of Ruxu, the brave Wu general Gan Ning raided Cao Cao's camp of 400,000 men with only 100 cavalry. Not a single man or horse was lost.
trans-unit.target: 在濡须第二场战役，吴国勇敢的将领甘宁率领百名骑兵击败曹操四十万大军，并且未损失任何兵马。 （第六十八回 甘宁百骑劫魏营）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·59 | Wu Infantry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Infantry
trans-unit.target: 吴国步兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·59 | Wu Infantry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The first battle of Hefei was Sun Quan's last as a field general. From then on he let his generals command in the field while he directed battle from behind the front lines.
trans-unit.target: 在合淝一战，孙权最后一次亲自率领大军，从那之后，他专注于内部的管理，而将大军的指挥权交给他的将领们。 （第六十七回 张辽威镇逍遥津）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·60 | Wu Light Cavalry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Light Cavalry
trans-unit.target: 吴国轻骑兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·60 | Wu Light Cavalry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship
trans-unit.target: 马术

trans-unit.resname: PTK·60 | Wu Light Cavalry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A cunning strategist, Cao Ren tricked Zhou Yu by letting him enter Nanjun. Zhou Yu thought he was capturing the city until Cao Ren's arrows rained down upon him.
trans-unit.target: 狡猾的策士曹仁，计诱周瑜进入南郡。直到曹仁的箭在他头上如雨而下之前，周瑜还认为他已占领南郡。 （第五十一回 曹仁大战东吴兵）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·61 | Wu Longbowman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Longbowman
trans-unit.target: 吴国长弓箭手

trans-unit.resname: PTK·61 | Wu Longbowman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap CARDNAME to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置CARDNAME，以对任一个生物或玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·62 | Wu Scout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Scout
trans-unit.target: 吴国斥候

trans-unit.resname: PTK·62 | Wu Scout | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, look at your opponent's hand.
trans-unit.target: 马术 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以检视你对手的手牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·63 | Wu Spy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Spy
trans-unit.target: 吴国间谍

trans-unit.resname: PTK·63 | Wu Spy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, look at the top two cards of any player's library. Put one of them on the top of that player's library and the other in his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，检视任何玩家牌库顶端二张牌，将一张牌放回该玩家的牌库顶上，另一张置入该玩家的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·64 | Wu Warship | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wu Warship
trans-unit.target: 吴国战船

trans-unit.resname: PTK·64 | Wu Warship | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.
trans-unit.target: 除非防御玩家有任何海岛在场，否则CARDNAME不可攻击。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·64 | Wu Warship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Both Wu and Wei warships patrolled the Yangtze River, the natural border between the two kingdoms.
trans-unit.target: 吴国跟魏国的战船在二国间的天然边境～长江上巡逻。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·65 | Zhou Yu, Chief Commander | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander
trans-unit.target: 大都督周瑜

trans-unit.resname: PTK·65 | Zhou Yu, Chief Commander | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Zhou Yu can't attack unless your opponent has an island in play.
trans-unit.target: 除非你的对手有任何海岛在场，否则周瑜不能攻击。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·65 | Zhou Yu, Chief Commander | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "After making me, Zhou Yu, did you have to make Kongming?"\n—Zhou Yu crying to heaven on his deathbed
trans-unit.target: 「既生瑜，何生亮。」 ～周瑜临终时向天嚎哭 （第五十七回 柴桑口卧龙吊丧）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·66 | Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist
trans-unit.target: 吴国策士诸葛瑾

trans-unit.resname: PTK·66 | Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Zhuge Jin to make any one creature unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置诸葛瑾，以使任一个生物在此回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·66 | Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Zhuge Jin proposed the marriage of Guan Yu's daugher and Sun Quan's heir, Guan Yu's arrogant refusal led to disaster.
trans-unit.target: 诸葛瑾提议让孙权的嗣子与关羽的女儿结为连理，而关羽傲慢的拒绝却为他种下了日后败亡之因。 （第七十三回 玄德进位汉中王）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·67 | Ambition's Cost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ambition's Cost
trans-unit.target: 野心的代价

trans-unit.resname: PTK·67 | Ambition's Cost | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. You lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。你失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·67 | Ambition's Cost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you give offense to heaven, to whom can you pray?"\n—Cao Cao, quoting Confucius
trans-unit.target: 「获罪于天，无所祷也。」 ～曹操引自论语

trans-unit.resname: PTK·68 | Cao Cao, Lord of Wei | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cao Cao, Lord of Wei
trans-unit.target: 魏国君主曹操

trans-unit.resname: PTK·68 | Cao Cao, Lord of Wei | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Cao Cao to force your opponent to choose and discard two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置曹操，以使你的对手从其手牌中选择二张并弃掉。（如果你的对手只剩一张手牌，他弃掉该张牌）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·102 | Blaze | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Spreading flames illumined cloud and sea: Cao Cao went down; 'twas Zhou Yu's victory."
trans-unit.target: 「烈火初张照云海，周郎曾此破曹公。」 （第五十回 诸葛亮智算华容）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·103 | Burning Fields | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burning Fields
trans-unit.target: 纵火燎原

trans-unit.resname: PTK·103 | Burning Fields | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 5 damage to your opponent.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对你的对手造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·103 | Burning Fields | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In raiding and plundering, be like fire, in immovability like a mountain."\n—Sun Tzu, *Art of War* (trans. Giles)
trans-unit.target: 「疾如风，徐如林，侵略如火，不动如山。」 ～孙子兵法

trans-unit.resname: PTK·104 | Burning of Xinye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Burning of Xinye
trans-unit.target: 火烧新野

trans-unit.resname: PTK·104 | Burning of Xinye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You destroy four of your lands and your opponent destroys four of his or her lands. Then CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 你消灭4张你的地牌，且你的对手也消灭4张他的地牌。然后CARDNAME对场上每一个生物造成4点伤害。（这包括你的生物）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·105 | Control of the Court | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Control of the Court
trans-unit.target: 干涉朝政

trans-unit.resname: PTK·105 | Control of the Court | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw four cards and put them into your hand. Then discard three cards at random from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 抓四张牌并放入你的手牌中。然后从你的手牌中随机弃掉三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·105 | Control of the Court | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Power-hungry eunuchs, the curse of the dynasty, have thrown the masses of the people into the depths of misery."
trans-unit.target: 掌权的太监是朝代的祸源，使得人民陷入痛苦的深渊。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·106 | Corrupt Eunuchs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Corrupt Eunuchs
trans-unit.target: 十常侍

trans-unit.resname: PTK·106 | Corrupt Eunuchs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, it deals 2 damage to any one creature. (If you're the only one with creatures, deal the damage to one of them.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，它对任何一个生物造成2点伤害。（如果场上只有你的生物，则对该生物之一造成伤害）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·107 | Desert Sandstorm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Desert Sandstorm
trans-unit.target: 沙漠风暴

trans-unit.resname: PTK·107 | Desert Sandstorm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物造成1点伤害。（这包括你的生物）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·107 | Desert Sandstorm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While pursuing the remnants of Yuan Shao's forces into the Wuhan Desert, Cao Cao was temporarily turned back by a fierce sandstorm.
trans-unit.target: 在乌桓沙漠追捕袁绍的残军时，曹操因为猛烈的沙漠风暴而暂时撤退。 （第三十三回 郭嘉遗计定辽东）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·108 | Diaochan, Artful Beauty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Diaochan, Artful Beauty
trans-unit.target: 乱世红颜貂蝉

trans-unit.resname: PTK·108 | Diaochan, Artful Beauty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Diaochan to destroy any one creature. Then, your opponent destroys any one creature of his or her choice.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合，宣告攻击前，你可以横置貂蝉，以消灭任一个生物。然后，你的对手选择消灭任一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·109 | Dong Zhou, the Tyrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dong Zhou, the Tyrant
trans-unit.target: 汉太师董卓

trans-unit.resname: PTK·109 | Dong Zhou, the Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Dong Zhou comes into play, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature deals damage to him or her equal to its power. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any creatures in play.)
trans-unit.target: 当董卓进场时，选择你对手场上的一个生物。该生物对该对手造成等同于它力量的伤害。（若你的对手没有任何生物在场，则忽略此效应）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·110 | Eunuchs' Intrigues | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eunuchs' Intrigues
trans-unit.target: 十常侍的密谋

trans-unit.resname: PTK·110 | Eunuchs' Intrigues | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Only that creature can block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你的对手选择他的一个生物。本回合只有该生物可进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·110 | Eunuchs' Intrigues | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Taking control of powerful court positions one by one, eunuchs eventually brought on the fall of the Han dynasty, leading to the chaos of the Three Kingdoms.
trans-unit.target: 太监一步步的取得控制宫廷重要的职位，最后带来汉朝的灭亡，开始了混乱的三国时期。 （第二回 何国舅谋诛宦竖）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·111 | Fire Ambush | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fire Ambush
trans-unit.target: 火攻突袭

trans-unit.resname: PTK·111 | Fire Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任一个生物或玩家造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·111 | Fire Ambush | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With fire he broke the battle at Bowang . . . . Striking fear deep into Cao Cao's soul, thus Kongming scored a coup at his debut."
trans-unit.target: 「博望相持用火攻，指挥如意笑谈中。直须惊破曹公胆，初出茅庐第一功。」 （第三十九回 博望坡军师初用兵）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·112 | Fire Bowman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fire Bowman
trans-unit.target: 火弓箭手

trans-unit.resname: PTK·112 | Fire Bowman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may destroy CARDNAME to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以消灭CARDNAME，以对任何一个生物或玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·113 | Imperial Recruiter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imperial Recruiter
trans-unit.target: 近卫队

trans-unit.resname: PTK·113 | Imperial Recruiter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, search your library for a creature card with power no greater than 2, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterward.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，搜寻你牌库中任何一张力量不大于2S的生物牌，展示该牌，并置入你手中。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·114 | Independent Troops | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Independent Troops
trans-unit.target: 独立部队

trans-unit.resname: PTK·114 | Independent Troops | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The empire, long united, must divide, and long divided, must unite."
trans-unit.target: 「天下大势，合久必分，分久必合。」 （第一回 宴桃园豪杰三结义）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·115 | Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms
trans-unit.target: 勇武者吕布

trans-unit.resname: PTK·115 | Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nLu Bu is unaffected by summoning sickness.
trans-unit.target: 马术

trans-unit.resname: PTK·115 | Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dong Zhuo's man, Lu Bu, warrior without peer, / Far surpassed the champions of his sphere."
trans-unit.target: 吕布不受召唤失调的影响。 「温侯吕布世无比，雄才四海夸英伟。」 （第五回 破关兵三英战吕布）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·116 | Ma Chao, Western Warrior | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ma Chao, Western Warrior
trans-unit.target: 平西将军马超

trans-unit.resname: PTK·116 | Ma Chao, Western Warrior | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nWhenever Ma Chao attacks and no other creatures do, Ma Chao can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 马术 当只有马超进行攻击时，马超不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·117 | Mountain Bandit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mountain Bandit
trans-unit.target: 山贼

trans-unit.resname: PTK·117 | Mountain Bandit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unaffected by summoning sickness.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不受召唤失调影响。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·117 | Mountain Bandit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Penniless and far from home, many former Yellow Scarves and other soldiers became bandits to survive.
trans-unit.target: 因为贫穷及离乡背井，黄巾贼及其他的士兵只得落草为寇。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·118 | Ravaging Horde | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ravaging Horde
trans-unit.target: 掠夺部队

trans-unit.resname: PTK·118 | Ravaging Horde | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, destroy any one land.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，消灭任何一张地。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·118 | Ravaging Horde | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Upon his return to the capitol after taking soldiers to loot a nearby peaceful town, the prime minister, Dong Zhou, boasted of it as a victory over bandits.
trans-unit.target: 村民结社，董卓命军士围住尽皆杀之，班师回朝扬言杀贼大胜而归。 （第四回 谋董贼孟德献刀）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·119 | Relentless Assault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relentless Assault
trans-unit.target: 无情的突袭

trans-unit.resname: PTK·119 | Relentless Assault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You may declare an additional attack this turn.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有在此回合中已进行攻击的生物。这回合你可以额外多宣告一次攻击。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·119 | Relentless Assault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With only 70,000 men under his command at the battle of Guandu, Cao Cao was able to defeat Yuan Shao and his 700,000.
trans-unit.target: 官渡战争中，曹操仅以七万士兵，便击败袁绍所率领的七十万大军。 （第三十一回 曹操仓亭破本初）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·120 | Renegade Troops | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Renegade Troops
trans-unit.target: 叛军

trans-unit.resname: PTK·120 | Renegade Troops | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unaffected by summoning sickness.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不受召唤失调影响。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·120 | Renegade Troops | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Across the land rebellions seethed and swarmed / As vicious war lords swooped down on all sides."
trans-unit.target: 「四方盗贼如蚁众，六合奸雄皆鹰扬。」 （第一二零回 降孙皓三分归一统）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·121 | Rockslide Ambush | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rockslide Ambush
trans-unit.target: 落石埋伏

trans-unit.resname: PTK·121 | Rockslide Ambush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals to any one creature damage equal to the number of mountain cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped mountain cards.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任一个生物造成等同于你场上山脉数量的伤害。（这包括你横置与未横置的山脉）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·122 | Rolling Earthquake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rolling Earthquake
trans-unit.target: 地动山摇

trans-unit.resname: PTK·122 | Rolling Earthquake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each player and each creature without horsemanship. (This includes you and your creatures without horsemanship.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个玩家及每个没有马术异能的生物造成X点伤害。（这包括你场上没有马术异能的生物和你自己）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·123 | Stone Rain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stone Rain
trans-unit.target: 石雨

trans-unit.resname: PTK·123 | Stone Rain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy any one land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭任一张地。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·123 | Stone Rain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Soldiers often blocked off the steep mountain passes to ambush enemy troops in western and central China.
trans-unit.target: 士兵们经常在丛山峻岭里，遇到敌人所埋伏的重兵。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·124 | Warrior's Oath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Warrior's Oath
trans-unit.target: 军令状

trans-unit.resname: PTK·124 | Warrior's Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take another turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game. (You don't lose if you've already won.)
trans-unit.target: 你在此回合结束以后，继续进行额外的一个回合。该回合结束后，你输去该盘对战。（如果你已经获得胜利，则不会输）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·124 | Warrior's Oath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If I fail, my head is yours."\n—Warrior's oath common during the Three Kingdoms period
trans-unit.target: 「如果我输了，我的人头就是你的。」 ～三国时期常见的军令状

trans-unit.resname: PTK·125 | Yellow Scarves Cavalry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yellow Scarves Cavalry
trans-unit.target: 黄巾贼骑兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·125 | Yellow Scarves Cavalry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nCARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: 马术 CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·126 | Yellow Scarves General | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yellow Scarves General
trans-unit.target: 黄巾贼将领

trans-unit.resname: PTK·126 | Yellow Scarves General | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nCARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: 马术 CARDNAME不可进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·126 | Yellow Scarves General | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zhang Jue, leader of the Yellow Scarves rebellion, was a Taoist master and tutored his soldiers in those arts.
trans-unit.target: 黄巾贼的首领～张角，是道教领袖及士兵的导师。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·127 | Yellow Scarves Troops | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yellow Scarves Troops
trans-unit.target: 黄巾贼

trans-unit.resname: PTK·127 | Yellow Scarves Troops | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不可进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·127 | Yellow Scarves Troops | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Over 500,000 commoners followed Zhang Jue, General of Heaven, in his attempt to overthrow the corrupt Han dynasty.
trans-unit.target: 超过五十万民众跟随著天公将军张角，试图推翻腐败的汉朝。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·128 | Yuan Shao, the Indecisive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yuan Shao, the Indecisive
trans-unit.target: 汉太守袁绍

trans-unit.resname: PTK·128 | Yuan Shao, the Indecisive | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship\nEach of your creatures can't be blocked by more than one creature each turn as long as Yuan Shao is in play.
trans-unit.target: 马术 当袁绍在场上时，你的生物不能被二个以上的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·129 | Yuan Shao's Infantry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yuan Shao's Infantry
trans-unit.target: 袁绍步兵

trans-unit.resname: PTK·129 | Yuan Shao's Infantry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks and no other creatures do, CARDNAME can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 每当只有CARDNAME进行攻击时，CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·130 | Zodiac Dog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zodiac Dog
trans-unit.target: 十二生肖·狗

trans-unit.resname: PTK·130 | Zodiac Dog | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk (If defending player has a mountain in play, CARDNAME can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者（如果防御玩家有任何山脉在场，则此生物无法被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·130 | Zodiac Dog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: ". . . Jiang Wei alone still strove with might and main: / Nine times more he fought the north—in vain. . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「…姜维独凭气力高，九伐中原空劬劳。…」 （第一回 斩黄巾英雄首立功）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·131 | Zodiac Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zodiac Dragon
trans-unit.target: 十二生肖·龙

trans-unit.resname: PTK·131 | Zodiac Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is put into your graveyard, you may return CARDNAME to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME进入你的坟墓场，你可以将CARDNAME移回你的手中。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·131 | Zodiac Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: ". . . The kingdoms three are now the stuff of dream, / For men to ponder, past all praise or blame."
trans-unit.target: 「…鼎足三分已成梦，后人凭吊空牢骚。」 （第一二零回 降孙皓三分归一统）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·132 | Zodiac Goat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zodiac Goat
trans-unit.target: 十二生肖·羊

trans-unit.resname: PTK·132 | Zodiac Goat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk (If defending player has a mountain in play, CARDNAME can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者（如果防御玩家有任何山脉在场，则此生物无法被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·132 | Zodiac Goat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: ". . . Near death in Baidi, having reigned three years, / Bei sadly placed his son in Kongming's care. . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「…呜呼三载逝升遐，白帝托孤堪痛楚。…」 （第一二零回 降孙皓三分归一统）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·133 | Borrowing the East Wind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borrowing the East Wind
trans-unit.target: 借东风

trans-unit.resname: PTK·133 | Borrowing the East Wind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each player and each creature with horsemanship. (This includes you and your creatures with horsemanship.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个玩家及每个具马术异能的生物造成X点伤害。（这包括你及你的生物）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·134 | False Mourning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: False Mourning
trans-unit.target: 诈死

trans-unit.resname: PTK·134 | False Mourning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take any one card from your graveyard and put that card on the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 移回你坟墓场中任一张牌，并将其置于你牌库顶上。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·134 | False Mourning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zhou Yu, Sun Ce, and other famous generals feigned their deaths in order to later surprise their opponents.
trans-unit.target: 周瑜、孙策及其他名将都曾假造自己的死讯，好在日后给对手个出其不意。 （第五十一回 孔明一气周公瑾）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·135 | Forest Bear | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forest Bear
trans-unit.target: 树林熊

trans-unit.resname: PTK·135 | Forest Bear | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Fish and bear paws—one can't have both.\n—Chinese idiom meaning "you can't have it both ways"
trans-unit.target: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·136 | Heavy Fog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heavy Fog
trans-unit.target: 大雾

trans-unit.resname: PTK·136 | Heavy Fog | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.\nThis turn, all damage dealt to you by attacking creatures is reduced to 0.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣布阻挡者之前使用。 在此回合中，所有由攻击生物对你造成的伤害均被减少至0。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·137 | Hua Tuo, Honored Physician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hua Tuo, Honored Physician
trans-unit.target: 盖世名医华陀

trans-unit.resname: PTK·137 | Hua Tuo, Honored Physician | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Hua Tuo to put any one creature card from your graveyard on the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，宣告攻击前，你可以横置华陀，以移回你坟墓场中任何一张生物牌，并将它置于你牌库顶上。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·138 | Hunting Cheetah | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hunting Cheetah
trans-unit.target: 巡行猎豹

trans-unit.resname: PTK·138 | Hunting Cheetah | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME successfully damages your opponent, you may search your library for a forest card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterward.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME成功地对你的对手造成伤害时，你可以在你的牌库中搜寻一张树林牌，展示该牌，再将它放入你的手中。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·139 | Lady Zhurong, Warrior Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lady Zhurong, Warrior Queen
trans-unit.target: 战斗皇后祝融夫人

trans-unit.resname: PTK·139 | Lady Zhurong, Warrior Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Horsemanship
trans-unit.target: 马术

trans-unit.resname: PTK·139 | Lady Zhurong, Warrior Queen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A man, and such a fool! I, a woman, will fight them for you."\n—Lady Zhurong to her husband Meng Huo, before leading an army against the Shu
trans-unit.target: 「既为男子，何无智也！我虽是一妇人愿代你出征。」 ～祝融夫人，于代其夫孟获出征抗蜀前 （第九十回 驱巨兽六破蛮兵）

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进行攻击且被阻挡时，你可以改为对防御玩家，而非对阻挡它的生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.target: 当孟获在场上时，所有你其他的绿色生物得+1S/+1D。

trans-unit.resname: PTK·142 | Meng Huo, Barbarian King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The stubborn Meng Huo was captured and released by Kongming seven times before finally surrendering.
trans-unit.target: 顽固的孟获被孔明七擒七纵后终于投降了。 （第九十回 烧藤甲兵七擒孟获）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·143 | Meng Huo's Horde | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Through his allies, Meng Huo commanded several hundred thousand troops composed of cavalry, rattan-armored warriors, infantry, naked men with swords, and wild animals.
trans-unit.target: 孟获连同他的盟国，指挥数以千计由骑兵、藤甲兵、步兵、大刀兵及野兽所组成的部队。 （第九十回 烧藤甲七擒孟获）

trans-unit.resname: PTK·144 | Riding the Dilu Horse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All men have their appointed time; that's something no horse can change."\n—Liu Bei, after being told that the Dilu brings its master ill fortune
trans-unit.target: 「凡人死生有命，岂马所能妨哉！」 ～刘备闻的卢马将引致恶运时所言 （第三十四回 刘皇叔跃马过檀溪）
